citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:06 PM on
15JUN2022.
The inspector knocked on the door, yelled out back where the animal barns are located, called and left a message, waited
until 12:49 PM before leaving.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:06 PM on 
15JUN2022. 
 
The inspector knocked on the door, yelled out back where the animal barns are located, called and left a message, waited 
until 12:49 PM before leaving. 
 
 
 
End Section
